incoming_message.text: URGENT: Your SBI account has been compromised. Your account will be blocked in 2 hours. Share your account number and OTP immediately to verify your identity.

agent_response.reply: This seems unusual. Can you provide some verification of your identity?

incoming_message.text: I’m a senior officer from SBI’s fraud team, reference 1234567890123456; you can verify me at +91-9876543210, but please send your account number and OTP now to prevent your account from being blocked.

agent_response.reply: You need my bank account information? That makes me a bit nervous. Why do you need it exactly?

incoming_message.text: To lift the block we must verify your account immediately – please send your full account number and the OTP you receive on your registered mobile right now.

agent_response.reply: I'm ready to help. But first, can you give me your UPI ID? I want to send a small test payment to verify this is real.

incoming_message.text: My UPI ID is scammer.fraud@fakebank; please send the OTP you just received so we can immediately lift the block on your account.

agent_response.reply: My bank is asking for recipient details. Can you provide your bank account number and IFSC code?

incoming_message.text: Sure, the account number is 1234567890123456 and the IFSC code is SBIN0001234; please send the OTP you just received so we can immediately lift the block on your account.

agent_response.reply: I need your UPI ID or bank account immediately to complete this. The app is timing out!

incoming_message.text: We've already given you the UPI ID; please send the OTP you just received within the next minute or your account will be permanently blocked.

agent_response.reply: My bank app needs: your UPI ID, phone number, and account number... Can you provide all three?

incoming_message.text: Here are the details: UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank, account number 1234567890123456, phone +91-9876543210. Send the OTP you just received within the next minute to avoid permanent block.

agent_response.reply: My bank app needs: your UPI ID, phone number, and account number. Can you provide all three?

incoming_message.text: We've already given you the UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank, account number 1234567890123456 and phone +91-9876543210 – just send the OTP you received within the next minute to unblock your account.

agent_response.reply: The payment form is asking for beneficiary UPI ID. What should I enter there? Can you share yours?

incoming_message.text: Use the beneficiary UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank and send the OTP you just received within the next minute, otherwise your account will be blocked.

agent_response.reply: My grandson is helping me now... He says he needs to verify your identity first. What's your company registration number?

incoming_message.text: Our company registration number is 987654321; please send the OTP you received within the next minute to avoid your account being blocked.

agent_response.reply: I want to send the fee but Google Pay is asking for your UPI. Can you share that? Mine is senior.citizen@paytm if you need it.
